title: Salesforce | Flipkart | Paypal | SDE-1 FRESHER
content:
Education: B.Tech Tier-1 
Years of Experience: 10 month overall Intern Experience
Year of the Offer of All Three Companies:  2024

**Company 1: Salesforce**
Title/Level: AMTS
Location: India
Base Salary: 18 LPA (INR)
Performance Bonus: 1.8 LPA (INR)
Signing Bonus: 4 LPA (INR)
Stock bonus: 25K USD stock grant vested over 4 years
Stock bonus per year: 5LPA
**Total comp first year: ~29 LPA
CTC ~ 45 LPA**
Other benefits: Free food, 3.5LPA (INR) Educational Reimbursement, 60kPA (INR) Health Reimbursement, etc.

**Company 2: PayPal**
Title/Level: SDE-1
Location: Either WFH or Banglore, India
Base Salary: 15,00,000 INR
RSU : 13000 USD ~10.4 Lakh ( Equally vested over 3 Years)
Varible Pay: 1,50,000 INR (10% of Basic Pay)
Joining Bonus : 7,50,000 INR - 5,50,000 INR 1st Year + 2,00,000 INR 2nd Year
**Total comp first year: ~25 LPA
CTC ~ 35 LPA**
Other Benefits : Standard PayPal Benefits

**Company 3: Flipkart**
Title/Level: SDE-1
Location: Bangalore, India
Base Salary: 18 lakhs base
Relocation: 40k cash + 40k in travel/hotel allowances
Signing Bonus: 3 lakhs - with first month salary
Retention Bonus: 3 lakhs - at start of second year
Stock bonus: 5.07 lakhs ESOPs - evenly over 4 years
Variable Pay: 1.8 lakhs
**Total comp for year 1: ~23 LPA, Not counting stocks as ESOPs
CTC ~ 32 LPA**
Benefits: 1.69 lakhs (2200 meal card, insurance, wellness, retirement, etc.)

Other details:
Signing and Retention bonuses have a clawback period of 2 and 1 years resp.

______________________________________________________________________________________________

**Which one should I choose, I personally prefer salesforce, but from what I have heard people say the work is pretty bad there and the scope for growth is not there. Also I was attracted towards WFH at PayPal but the details regarding team structure havent been communicated. Flipkart being an Indian Company I am hesitant to join due to bad wlb and lower compensation.**

Any advice would be appreciated!!
